content:
I agree with letting the camera catch images without fetters. Deciding which photos to use later will likely result in the best possible finished project. I have a "set" storyline which causes me no end of grief. Text is a monster to wrestle with, indeed. The photos are unplanned other than being some aspect of the Canadian prairie, the setting of the storyline.

I look forward to seeing your final book.
